title: Fireside with the Underboss - His Father Set Him Up To Be Killed
description: Sammy tells us a story about an informant in the Colombo family who accidentally gets exposed. The informants father, a very loyal associate for the Colombos, offers to whack his own son for what he did.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy tells us a story about an informant in the Colombo family who accidentally gets exposed. The informants father, a very loyal associate for the Colombos, offers to whack his own son for what he did.
